mapper.sql: SELECT /* prPrestHist.presentationListBase */ PPH.GOODS_NO , PGB.GOODS_NM , PPH.PREST_NM , SUBSTRING(PPH.APLY_STR_DT,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTRING(PPH.APLY_STR_DT,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTRING(PPH.APLY_STR_DT,7,2) AS APLY_STR_DT , SUBSTRING(PPH.APLY_END_DT,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTRING(PPH.APLY_END_DT,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTRING(PPH.APLY_END_DT,7,2) AS APLY_END_DT , PPH.USE_YN , PPH.SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(PPH.SYS_MOD_DTM,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_PREST_HIST PPH LEFT OUTER JOIN PR_GOODS_BASE PGB ON PPH.GOODS_NO = PGB.GOODS_NO WHERE PPH.GOODS_NO LIKE #{goodsNo} || '%' AND PGB.GOODS_NM LIKE #{goodsNm} || '%' AND PPH.APLY_STR_dT >= #{aplyStrDt} || '%' AND PPH.APLY_END_DT <= #{aplyEndDt} || '%' AND PPH.PREST_NM LIKE #{prestNm} || '%' AND PPH.USE_YN LIKE #{useYn} || '%' ORDER BY APLY_STR_DT
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS ( /* prPrestHist.checkDuplicate */ SELECT * FROM PR_PREST_HIST WHERE GOODS_NO = #{goodsNo} AND ( APLY_STR_DT BETWEEN REPLACE(#{aplyStrDt},'-','') AND REPLACE(#{aplyEndDt},'-','') OR APLY_END_DT BETWEEN REPLACE(#{aplyStrDt},'-','') AND REPLACE(#{aplyEndDt},'-','') ) ) AS EXIST

SELECT GOODS_NO /* prPrestHist.getPresentList */ , SUBSTRING(APLY_STR_DT,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTRING(APLY_STR_DT,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTRING(APLY_STR_DT,7,2) AS APLY_STR_DT , SUBSTRING(APLY_END_DT,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTRING(APLY_END_DT,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTRING(APLY_END_DT,7,2) AS APLY_END_DT , PREST_NM , USE_YN , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_PREST_HIST WHERE GOODS_NO = #{goodsNo} ORDER BY APLY_STR_DT, APLY_END_DT
